blog.name: incorrect-marauders
blog.title: incorrect marauders quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by moony, padfoot, wormtail, and prongs. lilykins, snivellus, and minnie make some appearances.

summary:
McGonagall: Mr. Black, why don't you wait outside in the hall?
Sirius: Why don't you?
McGonagall: Your next option is to stay....
body:
McGonagall: Mr. Black, why don't you wait outside in the hall?
Sirius: Why don't you?
McGonagall: Your next option is to stay. In detention.

dialogue.label: McGonagall:
dialogue.phrase: Mr. Black, why don't you wait outside in the hall?

dialogue.name: McGonagall
dialogue.label: McGonagall:
dialogue.phrase: Your next option is to stay. In detention.

summary: To be honest dear, I think getting a job would actually help you. How about fashion consultant? Travel columnist? What do you...
question: To be honest dear, I think getting a job would actually help you. How about fashion consultant? Travel columnist? What do you like to do?
answer: Narcissa: I don’t want a job.  I’m a lady of leisure.

lbh most of these kids would be working in faceless and soul crushing middle management
imagine harry's personal crisis if he ended up managing a drill factory
summary: The least believable part of grown-up hp fics is when they're all working in jobs relevant to their interests and talents, that...
body: The least believable part of grown-up hp fics is when they’re all working in jobs relevant to their interests and talents, that they’ve wanted to be in since childhood.

title: Patiently Waiting
body:
Patiently Waiting

To me it seems like Christmas morning, even though Christmas isn’t for another 124 days. For me one of the most exciting days a year is when I bring home a new Lego set. Until now, I’ve never done a project as big as the one I’m about to embark on, and          I’ve never ordered such a set online either. All day I’ve been watching the window for the FedEx truck, and as the day…

View On WordPress

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: The mystery of the evil twin (Potterlock)
title: The mystery of the evil twin (Potterlock)
body:
(I am not Englisch, so sorry for mistakes)

It was just an ordinary day at Hogwarts. Sherlock was brewing some potions for an experiment, while John was fascinated by Sherlocks knowledge.
Sherlock was sorted into Ravenclaw, because he was smart and he loved to study. John was a Gryffindor, he loved adventure and he was never afraid. He always follows Sherlock on his adventures, at that part he was a bit like a Hufflepuff, always wanted to help Sherlock.
Once they had a mystery which leaded the boys to the forbidden forest. Nobody goes there, but John and Sherlock did. Sherlock goes often to the forest for some of his experiments. Sometimes John and Sherlock walked deep into the forest. Many mysteries had waited for them there. For John was living with Sherlock one big adventure, he never gets bored.
Sherlock was a Ravenclaw, but he was also part Slytherin. He always strives for success and wanted to show how good he is in what he does. For Sherlock was solving mysteries like the drugs they had in the muggle world.
‘John, give me some ingredients.’ Sherlock asked.
‘Why don’t you do it yourself?’
‘Because I need to keep this steady. Otherwise it will explode.’
John sighs, but still walks to the other table for ingredients. He looked trough the window. It was dark outside during this winter. The castle grounds where filled with snow. The moon slowly rises upon the sky. It was a full moon, beautiful, like a silver piece of the universe.
Johns thoughts where roughly interrupted by a loud scream. Sherlock looked directly at John. ‘Murder.’ He said as a small smile appeared on his face. Sherlock jumps off his chair and drops everything he had in his hands.
'Come on John! We got a new mystery!’
Sherlock and John had just left the room, when John heard a pop. The potion was exploded and probably left a mess. Snape won’t be happy.

The two last years ran towards the origin of the scream. It was in one of the other dungeons where they found the body. It was a boy with brown hair.
‘First years, I think. A Ravenclaw.’ John said.
‘First years, I know, he doesn’t have books from the second year in his bag.’ Sherlock dropped the bag and looked at the boy. The body was full of blood and in a horrible condition. From the murderer was no sign.
‘The wounds are about four centimetres deep, but look at his chest.’ John said. The chest was ripped open. It looked like some kind of animal.
‘Werewolf.’ Sherlock said. John looks up from the body.
‘Werewolf?’
‘Yes, a werewolf, are you deaf.’
‘How do you know?’
‘Look at the wounds. The most of them are like lines, scratches of a claw. They are four centimetres deep as you mentioned earlier. The scratches are at a certain distance from each other. Not more than two centimetres. Spread your fingers and look at them, the distance is not very far from each other, just like these scratches. Besides, Hogwarts is extremely secured. Only a teacher or a student could do this, but this looks like an animal. What animal do we know with a human form, or better, what kind of human has the form of an animal? Yes, the werewolf.’ Sherlock looked at the bleeding body on the ground.
‘One of the students is the werewolf, look again at the distance between the scratches. The hands can’t be from an adult. The deepest wounds bend to the right, so the Murderer is right-handed.’

‘You two, go away!’ Professor McGonagall said as she walked into the dungeon, followed by professor Snape.
’50 points from Gryffindor and Ravenclaw.’ Snape said full of anger.
‘What?! Why!’ John said surprised.
‘Because you two ruined my classroom and are always the first persons at things like this!’
John wanted to protest, but he knew it was better not to argue with Snape.
‘It was a werewolf, I don’t need any thanks.’ Sherlock said when he got up.
‘Clean my classroom and go to your dormitories.’ Ordered Snape grumpy.

The next day Sherlock and John where in the Great hall with all the other students. Professor Dumbledore tried to get the students quiet.
‘A student was murdered last night.’ He said. Some students began to scream, while others began to talk loudly. Sherlock and John looked at each other, this was old news for them.
‘We don’t know who or what did this.’ Dumbledore said, when the room had come to rest again. Sherlock rolls his eyes, they knew it, he had said it yesterday, but they won’t believe him. Why do they never believe him?!
‘There is no reason for panic! Professor Lupin and professor Snape will keep an eye out.’
Sherlock hated it when there where more professors awake at night. It only hindered his investigation, but he had to deal with it.
Dumbledore was still talking, but Sherlock wasn’t listening anymore. He was looking at the other students, observing them. Too young, too tall, too small, his eyes went from one to the other, but he did not see the possible perpetrator so quickly.

‘Sherlock, we need to find the killer, before the next full moon!’ John said when they left the Great hall.
‘We will find the killer John’ Sherlock looked at his friend.
‘You saw the body, we can’t let that happen to anyone else.’
‘I agree.’
´So, are we searching for a first years? They are new, just like this wolf.’
They walked to Lupins classroom.
‘No, it could just as well be a fourth-year student who just has been bitten.’
Sherlock held his hands under his chin and thought.
‘Maybe someone with scars or wounds.. Or someone who is scared of the moon.. someone who can disappear without anyone noticing.’
‘Maybe a twin?’
‘Indeed John, a twin!’

The boys walked into the classroom. Lupin was already talking.
‘Today we repeat the Patronus Charm, because the dementors are coming. They heard about the murder and will be on the castle grounds. For your own safety, we repeat this charm.’ Lupin went to Sherlock and John.
‘Sherlock, can you give an example?’
‘Of course I can. Expecto patronum.’ A silvery-white otter appeared from Sherlocks wand and dances through the classroom.
‘Now John.’ Lupin said.
‘Expecto patronum.’ A small hedgehog appeared from Johns wand. Lupin applauded for the boys.
‘Well done!’ He said. ‘Well done, both of you. 10 Points to Gryffindor and Ravenclaw!’

After class Lupin called Sherlock and John.
‘I know you two like adventure and mysteries, but stay away from this one. Werewolves are dangerous.’
‘You can know, you are one yourself.’ Sherlock said with a face of steal. Lupin looked surprised at him.
‘Yes, that’s true.’
‘So you are the killer?’ John mentions.
‘No, Snape makes potions for him every month, so he can control himself when he takes one. Am I right professor?’
‘Yes Sherlock, you are right.’

‘Are we going to listen to him?’ John asked when they left the classroom.
‘No.’
‘So tonight..’
‘Yes, we will find this wolf. The game is on!’

That same night Sherlock and John were on their way to the dungeons. Sherlock wanted to see the crime scene again. When they arrived, Sherlock went straight ahead. He looked at the place where the body was.
‘Clothes.’ John mentioned.
‘At least a piece of it.’ Sherlock said when he picks it up. ‘From a new cloak. I also saw some hair, long hair so our killer is very likely a girl.’
‘There are like six girl twins at Hogwarts.’
‘We go to the Slytherins, maybe they will tell something about their friends.’

‘Sarah and Laurel often come here.’ One of the Slytherins said.
‘Jade and Amy are my best friends.’ Another one said. Sherlock looked at John. This twin had blind hair.
‘Both of the twins often come here.’ The last one said. John and Sherlock had new suspects.
‘What do you think?’ John asks Sherlock.
‘We need to go to the Hufflepuffs.’

The common room of the Hufflepuffs was very quiet. Everyone was asleep when Sherlock and John walked in. Upstairs Sherlock heard a noise. It was talking.. from two people. Why where they awake so late?
‘John, upstairs, do you hear that?’ Sherlock asked. John listens very carefully.
‘Girls? Talking?’
‘Grab your wand.’ John grabs his wand and walked upstairs with Sherlock behind him. His wand ready to attack. The door creaked when John carefully opened it. The talking fell silent and the room filled with soft snoring. It was dark, the boys could barely see. John walked into the room with Sherlock right behind him.
Sherlock heard someone gasp for breath. Alarmed by the sound he turned. Two girls where sitting in the corner. One of them was crying.
‘The wolf I suppose.’ Sherlock said as he points his wand at the girls. The girls got up, they had their wands in their hands. One of them had the wand in the left hand, the other in the right.
‘Flipendo!’ Sherlock was blown back with a tremendous force. The girl ran out of the room, John ran after her.
The other girls in the room startled awake and started talking. Sherlock ran trough the door. He ran to a secret passage, his mind says they are going to the castle grounds.

Sherlock was right. He got out of the castle at the same time as John and the girl.
‘Jade, stop! We know what you are!’ The Hufflepuff began to run faster.
‘Petrificus totalus!’ Sherlock missed the girl barely. ‘Colloshoo.’ Again he missed. They ran further and further. Then suddenly everything went cold. It was winter, so the grounds couldn’t freeze any further, but Sherlock knew what was coming.
‘Dementors?’ John asked.
‘Obviously.’
The black shadow appeared for Jade. She started screaming, but felt in silence when the dementor started eating.
‘Expecto patronum!’ John and Sherlock screamed together. The hedgehog and the otter stormed at the creature that drew backwards. The light was shining so bright that it blinded Sherlock and John for a moment. Another dementor showed up before Sherlock.
‘Jawn!’ Sherlock screamed. John pushed Sherlock away from the dark creature.
‘Expecto patronum!’ Sherlock stands and John didn’t had to think any longer. He grabbed Jade by her arm and threw her away from the dementor into the castle. Sherlock followed right behind.

‘We are alive.’ John laughs. Sherlock looked at the girl. She was shaking all over her body.
‘You were very stupid, everyone knows there are dementors outside right now!’ Jade didn’t say anything.
‘Here, some chocolate. I had it in my pocket, because of the dementors.’ John breaks the chocolate and held a piece to Jade.
‘Eat it, you will feel better.’
‘Stop the nonsense John, we got our killer.’ Jade looked directly at Sherlock.
‘I didn’t want to hurt anybody.’ She started crying. ‘I don’t know what happened.’
‘You are a werewolf, you know what you did, you talked to your sister about that.’ John looked from his friend to the girl and back.
‘How did you knew it was her?’ He asked.
‘She has long blond hair, she is a Hufflepuff, the cloak we found was new, she is a last years student, but she got recently a new cloak. In the great hall she castes her Patronus charm, I noticed it had changed into a wolf. Before it was a mastiff. She is right-handed, because she holds her wand in the right hand. And she is a twin, so she could easily disappear without anyone noticing. Besides, she has friends in Slytherin, so that was her reason for being in the dungeons. She felt there was something wrong, so she ran to the other dungeon where she killed someone.’
‘How did she became a werewolf?’ John asked.
‘A wolf named Moriary bit me after flying class last week. He said he wanted to create panic in the school. Please don’t tell anyone.’
‘Don’t be scared only Dumbledore will know about this.’ John said.
‘Obviously. The rest will kill you if they knew.’
John gave Sherlock an angry look.
'But that won’t happen.’ Sherlock said quickly.

‘What are you doing here?!’ Professor Lupin asked. Snape stand behind him and looked really angry.
'We..’ John fell silent.
'Sherlock and John. I could know. Always on an adventure.’ Dumbledore walked in to the room. ‘You can go, I think I need to talk to them alone.’ He said. The professors leaved the room.
'We got your killer.’ Sherlock said. Dumbledore looked at Jade. She was still shaking.
‘Get her to Madam Pomfrey John. We will give her potions every month. She can stay at Hogwarts.’ John left the room with Jade. Sherlock looked at Dumbledore.
'You did believe me. I knew it, you didn’t tell it, so the wolf could stay at Hogwarts when you found out who it was.’ Dumbledore smiled.
'You are smart Sherlock. 100 points to Ravenclaw and Gryffindor. You solved the mystery.’
'As always.’ Sherlock mentioned.

John will write the story in his book. Because adventure and mystery.. that was what the boys loved

It took me a whole day to write this, so please do not copy it!

My first story in English. There may be some mistakes, but I am Dutch and not really good at Englisch, so I am proud of myself that I wrote in English. It took some time (a Dutch story with the same number of words only takes me an hour), but I hope you did like it.

‘Jade, stop! We know what you are!’ The Hufflepuff began to run faster.
‘Petrificus totalus!’ Sherlock missed the girl barely. ‘Colloshoo.’ Again he missed. They ran further and further. Then suddenly everything went cold. It was winter, so the grounds couldn’t freeze any further, but Sherlock knew what was coming.
‘Dementors?’ John asked.
‘Obviously.’
The black shadow appeared for Jade. She started screaming, but felt in silence when the dementor started eating.
‘Expecto patronum!’ John and Sherlock screamed together. The hedgehog and the otter stormed at the creature that drew backwards. The light was shining so bright that it blinded Sherlock and John for a moment. Another dementor showed up before Sherlock.
‘Jawn!’ Sherlock screamed. John pushed Sherlock away from the dark creature.
‘Expecto patronum!’ Sherlock stands and John didn’t had to think any longer. He grabbed Jade by her arm and threw her away from the dementor into the castle. Sherlock followed right behind.

‘We are alive.’ John laughs. Sherlock looked at the girl. She was shaking all over her body.
‘You were very stupid, everyone knows there are dementors outside right now!’ Jade didn’t say anything.
‘Here, some chocolate. I had it in my pocket, because of the dementors.’ John breaks the chocolate and held a piece to Jade.
‘Eat it, you will feel better.’
‘Stop the nonsense John, we got our killer.’ Jade looked directly at Sherlock.
‘I didn’t want to hurt anybody.’ She started crying. ‘I don’t know what happened.’
‘You are a werewolf, you know what you did, you talked to your sister about that.’ John looked from his friend to the girl and back.
‘How did you knew it was her?’ He asked.
‘She has long blond hair, she is a Hufflepuff, the cloak we found was new, she is a last years student, but she got recently a new cloak. In the great hall she castes her Patronus charm, I noticed it had changed into a wolf. Before it was a mastiff. She is right-handed, because she holds her wand in the right hand. And she is a twin, so she could easily disappear without anyone noticing. Besides, she has friends in Slytherin, so that was her reason for being in the dungeons. She felt there was something wrong, so she ran to the other dungeon where she killed someone.’
‘How did she became a werewolf?’ John asked.
‘A wolf named Moriary bit me after flying class last week. He said he wanted to create panic in the school. Please don’t tell anyone.’
‘Don’t be scared only Dumbledore will know about this.’ John said.
‘Obviously. The rest will kill you if they knew.’
John gave Sherlock an angry look.
'But that won’t happen.’ Sherlock said quickly.

‘What are you doing here?!’ Professor Lupin asked. Snape stand behind him and looked really angry.
'We..’ John fell silent.
'Sherlock and John. I could know. Always on an adventure.’ Dumbledore walked in to the room. ‘You can go, I think I need to talk to them alone.’ He said. The professors leaved the room.
'We got your killer.’ Sherlock said. Dumbledore looked at Jade. She was still shaking.
‘Get her to Madam Pomfrey John. We will give her potions every month. She can stay at Hogwarts.’ John left the room with Jade. Sherlock looked at Dumbledore.
'You did believe me. I knew it, you didn’t tell it, so the wolf could stay at Hogwarts when you found out who it was.’ Dumbledore smiled.
'You are smart Sherlock. 100 points to Ravenclaw and Gryffindor. You solved the mystery.’
'As always.’ Sherlock mentioned.

John will write the story in his book. Because adventure and mystery.. that was what the boys loved

It took me a whole day to write this, so please do not copy it!

My first story in English. There may be some mistakes, but I am Dutch and not really good at Englisch, so I am proud of myself that I wrote in English. It took some time (a Dutch story with the same number of words only takes me an hour), but I hope you did like it.

trail.content_raw:
(I am not Englisch, so sorry for mistakes)

It was just an ordinary day at Hogwarts. Sherlock was brewing some potions for an experiment, while John was fascinated by Sherlocks knowledge.
Sherlock was sorted into Ravenclaw, because he was smart and he loved to study. John was a Gryffindor, he loved adventure and he was never afraid. He always follows Sherlock on his adventures, at that part he was a bit like a Hufflepuff, always wanted to help Sherlock.
Once they had a mystery which leaded the boys to the forbidden forest. Nobody goes there, but John and Sherlock did. Sherlock goes often to the forest for some of his experiments. Sometimes John and Sherlock walked deep into the forest. Many mysteries had waited for them there. For John was living with Sherlock one big adventure, he never gets bored.
Sherlock was a Ravenclaw, but he was also part Slytherin. He always strives for success and wanted to show how good he is in what he does. For Sherlock was solving mysteries like the drugs they had in the muggle world.
‘John, give me some ingredients.’ Sherlock asked.
‘Why don’t you do it yourself?’
‘Because I need to keep this steady. Otherwise it will explode.’
John sighs, but still walks to the other table for ingredients. He looked trough the window. It was dark outside during this winter. The castle grounds where filled with snow. The moon slowly rises upon the sky. It was a full moon, beautiful, like a silver piece of the universe.
Johns thoughts where roughly interrupted by a loud scream. Sherlock looked directly at John. ‘Murder.’ He said as a small smile appeared on his face. Sherlock jumps off his chair and drops everything he had in his hands.
'Come on John! We got a new mystery!’
Sherlock and John had just left the room, when John heard a pop. The potion was exploded and probably left a mess. Snape won’t be happy.

The two last years ran towards the origin of the scream. It was in one of the other dungeons where they found the body. It was a boy with brown hair.
‘First years, I think. A Ravenclaw.’ John said.
‘First years, I know, he doesn’t have books from the second year in his bag.’ Sherlock dropped the bag and looked at the boy. The body was full of blood and in a horrible condition. From the murderer was no sign.
‘The wounds are about four centimetres deep, but look at his chest.’ John said. The chest was ripped open. It looked like some kind of animal.
‘Werewolf.’ Sherlock said. John looks up from the body.
‘Werewolf?’
‘Yes, a werewolf, are you deaf.’
‘How do you know?’
‘Look at the wounds. The most of them are like lines, scratches of a claw. They are four centimetres deep as you mentioned earlier. The scratches are at a certain distance from each other. Not more than two centimetres. Spread your fingers and look at them, the distance is not very far from each other, just like these scratches. Besides, Hogwarts is extremely secured. Only a teacher or a student could do this, but this looks like an animal. What animal do we know with a human form, or better, what kind of human has the form of an animal? Yes, the werewolf.’ Sherlock looked at the bleeding body on the ground.
‘One of the students is the werewolf, look again at the distance between the scratches. The hands can’t be from an adult. The deepest wounds bend to the right, so the Murderer is right-handed.’

‘You two, go away!’ Professor McGonagall said as she walked into the dungeon, followed by professor Snape.
’50 points from Gryffindor and Ravenclaw.’ Snape said full of anger.
‘What?! Why!’ John said surprised.
‘Because you two ruined my classroom and are always the first persons at things like this!’
John wanted to protest, but he knew it was better not to argue with Snape.
‘It was a werewolf, I don’t need any thanks.’ Sherlock said when he got up.
‘Clean my classroom and go to your dormitories.’ Ordered Snape grumpy.

The next day Sherlock and John where in the Great hall with all the other students. Professor Dumbledore tried to get the students quiet.
‘A student was murdered last night.’ He said. Some students began to scream, while others began to talk loudly. Sherlock and John looked at each other, this was old news for them.
‘We don’t know who or what did this.’ Dumbledore said, when the room had come to rest again. Sherlock rolls his eyes, they knew it, he had said it yesterday, but they won’t believe him. Why do they never believe him?!
‘There is no reason for panic! Professor Lupin and professor Snape will keep an eye out.’
Sherlock hated it when there where more professors awake at night. It only hindered his investigation, but he had to deal with it.
Dumbledore was still talking, but Sherlock wasn’t listening anymore. He was looking at the other students, observing them. Too young, too tall, too small, his eyes went from one to the other, but he did not see the possible perpetrator so quickly.

‘Sherlock, we need to find the killer, before the next full moon!’ John said when they left the Great hall.
‘We will find the killer John’ Sherlock looked at his friend.
‘You saw the body, we can’t let that happen to anyone else.’
‘I agree.’
´So, are we searching for a first years? They are new, just like this wolf.’
They walked to Lupins classroom.
‘No, it could just as well be a fourth-year student who just has been bitten.’
Sherlock held his hands under his chin and thought.
‘Maybe someone with scars or wounds.. Or someone who is scared of the moon.. someone who can disappear without anyone noticing.’
‘Maybe a twin?’
‘Indeed John, a twin!’

The boys walked into the classroom. Lupin was already talking.
‘Today we repeat the Patronus Charm, because the dementors are coming. They heard about the murder and will be on the castle grounds. For your own safety, we repeat this charm.’ Lupin went to Sherlock and John.
‘Sherlock, can you give an example?’
‘Of course I can. Expecto patronum.’ A silvery-white otter appeared from Sherlocks wand and dances through the classroom.
‘Now John.’ Lupin said.
‘Expecto patronum.’ A small hedgehog appeared from Johns wand. Lupin applauded for the boys.
‘Well done!’ He said. ‘Well done, both of you. 10 Points to Gryffindor and Ravenclaw!’

After class Lupin called Sherlock and John.
‘I know you two like adventure and mysteries, but stay away from this one. Werewolves are dangerous.’
‘You can know, you are one yourself.’ Sherlock said with a face of steal. Lupin looked surprised at him.
‘Yes, that’s true.’
‘So you are the killer?’ John mentions.
‘No, Snape makes potions for him every month, so he can control himself when he takes one. Am I right professor?’
‘Yes Sherlock, you are right.’

‘Are we going to listen to him?’ John asked when they left the classroom.
‘No.’
‘So tonight..’
‘Yes, we will find this wolf. The game is on!’

That same night Sherlock and John were on their way to the dungeons. Sherlock wanted to see the crime scene again. When they arrived, Sherlock went straight ahead. He looked at the place where the body was.
‘Clothes.’ John mentioned.
‘At least a piece of it.’ Sherlock said when he picks it up. ‘From a new cloak. I also saw some hair, long hair so our killer is very likely a girl.’
‘There are like six girl twins at Hogwarts.’
‘We go to the Slytherins, maybe they will tell something about their friends.’

‘Sarah and Laurel often come here.’ One of the Slytherins said.
‘Jade and Amy are my best friends.’ Another one said. Sherlock looked at John. This twin had blind hair.
‘Both of the twins often come here.’ The last one said. John and Sherlock had new suspects.
‘What do you think?’ John asks Sherlock.
‘We need to go to the Hufflepuffs.’

The common room of the Hufflepuffs was very quiet. Everyone was asleep when Sherlock and John walked in. Upstairs Sherlock heard a noise. It was talking.. from two people. Why where they awake so late?
‘John, upstairs, do you hear that?’ Sherlock asked. John listens very carefully.
‘Girls? Talking?’
‘Grab your wand.’ John grabs his wand and walked upstairs with Sherlock behind him. His wand ready to attack. The door creaked when John carefully opened it. The talking fell silent and the room filled with soft snoring. It was dark, the boys could barely see. John walked into the room with Sherlock right behind him.
Sherlock heard someone gasp for breath. Alarmed by the sound he turned. Two girls where sitting in the corner. One of them was crying.
‘The wolf I suppose.’ Sherlock said as he points his wand at the girls. The girls got up, they had their wands in their hands. One of them had the wand in the left hand, the other in the right.
‘Flipendo!’ Sherlock was blown back with a tremendous force. The girl ran out of the room, John ran after her.
The other girls in the room startled awake and started talking. Sherlock ran trough the door. He ran to a secret passage, his mind says they are going to the castle grounds.

Sherlock was right. He got out of the castle at the same time as John and the girl.
‘Jade, stop! We know what you are!’ The Hufflepuff began to run faster.
‘Petrificus totalus!’ Sherlock missed the girl barely. ‘Colloshoo.’ Again he missed. They ran further and further. Then suddenly everything went cold. It was winter, so the grounds couldn’t freeze any further, but Sherlock knew what was coming.
‘Dementors?’ John asked.
‘Obviously.’
The black shadow appeared for Jade. She started screaming, but felt in silence when the dementor started eating.
‘Expecto patronum!’ John and Sherlock screamed together. The hedgehog and the otter stormed at the creature that drew backwards. The light was shining so bright that it blinded Sherlock and John for a moment. Another dementor showed up before Sherlock.
‘Jawn!’ Sherlock screamed. John pushed Sherlock away from the dark creature.
‘Expecto patronum!’ Sherlock stands and John didn’t had to think any longer. He grabbed Jade by her arm and threw her away from the dementor into the castle. Sherlock followed right behind.

‘We are alive.’ John laughs. Sherlock looked at the girl. She was shaking all over her body.
‘You were very stupid, everyone knows there are dementors outside right now!’ Jade didn’t say anything.
‘Here, some chocolate. I had it in my pocket, because of the dementors.’ John breaks the chocolate and held a piece to Jade.
‘Eat it, you will feel better.’
‘Stop the nonsense John, we got our killer.’ Jade looked directly at Sherlock.
‘I didn’t want to hurt anybody.’ She started crying. ‘I don’t know what happened.’
‘You are a werewolf, you know what you did, you talked to your sister about that.’ John looked from his friend to the girl and back.
‘How did you knew it was her?’ He asked.
‘She has long blond hair, she is a Hufflepuff, the cloak we found was new, she is a last years student, but she got recently a new cloak. In the great hall she castes her Patronus charm, I noticed it had changed into a wolf. Before it was a mastiff. She is right-handed, because she holds her wand in the right hand. And she is a twin, so she could easily disappear without anyone noticing. Besides, she has friends in Slytherin, so that was her reason for being in the dungeons. She felt there was something wrong, so she ran to the other dungeon where she killed someone.’
‘How did she became a werewolf?’ John asked.
‘A wolf named Moriary bit me after flying class last week. He said he wanted to create panic in the school. Please don’t tell anyone.’
‘Don’t be scared only Dumbledore will know about this.’ John said.
‘Obviously. The rest will kill you if they knew.’
John gave Sherlock an angry look.
'But that won’t happen.’ Sherlock said quickly.

‘What are you doing here?!’ Professor Lupin asked. Snape stand behind him and looked really angry.
'We..’ John fell silent.
'Sherlock and John. I could know. Always on an adventure.’ Dumbledore walked in to the room. ‘You can go, I think I need to talk to them alone.’ He said. The professors leaved the room.
'We got your killer.’ Sherlock said. Dumbledore looked at Jade. She was still shaking.
‘Get her to Madam Pomfrey John. We will give her potions every month. She can stay at Hogwarts.’ John left the room with Jade. Sherlock looked at Dumbledore.
'You did believe me. I knew it, you didn’t tell it, so the wolf could stay at Hogwarts when you found out who it was.’ Dumbledore smiled.
'You are smart Sherlock. 100 points to Ravenclaw and Gryffindor. You solved the mystery.’
'As always.’ Sherlock mentioned.

blog.description:
Ya'll can call me whatever, but I prefer Creame.
Female/Whatever really. She/Her/Legit Anything Else.
I draw a lot, and I draw whatever I want, sorry. Lives at most things of the same name here on other places.

tags: serenity doesn’t hate you or anything merula stop trying to make her
she’s gonna treat you like any other student that she isn’t friends with
as long as you leave her friends alone you and her are fine merula she doesn’t care nor want to fight you
caption: Serenity: “…yes?”

summary: When Harry, Ron and Hermione were off horcrux hunting, they should have used the enchanted galleons from the DA to communicate...
body: When Harry, Ron and Hermione were off horcrux hunting, they should have used the enchanted galleons from the DA to communicate to everyone that they were ok and still fighting - it would have boosted the moral of the DA at Hogwarts and the Order would have known that they were ok because Fred & George had galleons and could have passed the message on!

reblog.comment: When Harry, Ron and Hermione were off horcrux hunting, they should have used the enchanted galleons from the DA to communicate to everyone that they were ok and still fighting - it would have boosted the moral of the DA at Hogwarts and the Order would have known that they were ok because Fred & George had galleons and could have passed the message on!

blog.name: subtlize
blog.description:
ellie / 19 / ravenclaw

i write sometimes but have the attention span of 0

summary:
in my most humble opinion, ‪lance is a ravenclaw.
not only is he emotionally intelligent, but i believe he’s also knowledgeable...
body:
in my most humble opinion, ‪lance is a ravenclaw.

not only is he emotionally intelligent, but i believe he’s also knowledgeable and pretends to be dumb or stupid in order for either comedic value and/or to lighten the mood. he’s also a team player and knows when to ask for help.

i hc the ravenclaw common room entrance to be locked with a riddle, but to unlock it isnt always about getting the riddle right, but working together w friends to figure it out and/or admitting you dont know something, but putting in an effort anyway. i picture lance exactly like this. taking his time to figure out a riddle, and being proud of himself when he gets it right, but also enjoys helping others & working together to figure out situation.

lance is also creative but in different ways.

i love my ravenclaw boy

blog.name: drarry-imagines
blog.title: Harry x Draco Imagines
blog.description:
Header image by @scarlet47 [PERMISSION BY ARTIST GRANTED]

This blog is a Bottom!Draco blog Only. Feel free to send prompts and and suggestions. I would be posting NSFW, one-shots, prompts and more.

Side Pairings that’ll appear: Pansmione, Roneville, Wolfstar, Linny.

summary:
I have a headcanon that Draco didn’t like when the house elves punished themselves. 
He was still rude and bratty to them (he’s...
body:
I have a headcanon that Draco didn’t like when the house elves punished themselves.

He was still rude and bratty to them (he’s probably like that to everyone) but he wasn’t a fan of them hitting themselves and constantly told them to stop doing it when in his presence.

One time he actually burst into tears when one of the house-elves were hurting themselves especially bad and Lucius had to order all of them to never punish themselves while Draco was anywhere close there.

I just feel like, Draco was a softy and didn’t enjoy violence or blood and was more of a verbal attacker.
